articles.author: Timsy Jaipuria
articles.title: India increases windfall profit tax on crude; Diesel, ATF tax cut to Nil - CNBCTV18
articles.description: India had first introduced the windfall profit tax in July 2022. Back then, export duties of ₹6 per litre each were levied on petrol and ATF, while that on diesel stood at ₹13 per litre.
